content.rendered:
Orchard Sophia Site Plan and Facilities

Step into Orchard Sophia and feel the vibrant energy pulsate through every corner. Dive into the luxurious pool at the heart of the central courtyard, calling you to unwind and rejuvenate.
Experience elegance and functionality in the Social Lounge, where moments with loved ones become even more memorable.

Level 1 Facilities

• Lap Pool
• Pool Deck
• Side Gate
• Guard House
• Bin Centre

Rooftop Facilities

• Spa Pool
• Changing Room
• Social Lounge
• Outdoor Fitness
• Alfresco BBQ
• Social Lawn
• Rooftop Bar
• Rooftop Dining
• Reading Lounge
Achieve peak fitness in the Outdoor Fitness, surrounded by blissful serenity. Indulge in pure relaxation at the private Spa Pool, rewarded with mesmerizing city views.
Host unforgettable gatherings at the Alfresco BBQ deck and find solace in the tranquil Social Lawn. Escape distractions in the peaceful Reading Lounge or indulge in the dazzling lights of the Singapore skyline at the Rooftop Dining and Bar.
Orchard Sophia invites you to embrace comfort, pleasure, and the thrill of urban living.

Contact Sales

      Submit without worry, we respect your privacy.
      Direct to Developer Sales.
      Zero Commision Fees.
      Orchard Sophia, Proudly Developed By

      Copyright 2023. All Rights Reserved.

      Developer: Orchard Sophia Pte Ltd (DB2Land) | Developer License No: C1417 | Tenure of Land: Freehold | Lot No.: Lot 00437M & 00213C TS19 At Sophia Road
